Game.Name: Jurassic Park III - Dino Attack (Europe) (En,Fr,De,Es,It)
Game.plot: Jurassic Park III: Island Attack is an Adventure game, developed and published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 2001.Cheat: Unlock sound effects testBeat the story mode once and the sound effects test will be available in the options menu.Cheat: Unlock sound effects testBeat the game once and the sound test will be available in the options menu.Cheat: Unlock sound effects testComplete at least one level to unlock the stage select.Cheat: Unlock sound effects testOnce you beat Story Mode you will successfully unlock Survival Mode.
